Controllers

Class ExaminationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.ExaminationController

  • public class ExaminationController
extends java.lang.Object
    public class ExaminationController have all the methods that connect the client GUI to the database.and manage all operations for examinations
    Author:
    maisam marjieh
